org.nise.ux.asl.face

Interface ServiceResponserFactory<D,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of <Data> being listened on <listening port>
    R - Type of <Response> to be sent toward service-client

    public interface ServiceResponserFactory<D,R>
    Interface used to create ServiceResponser instances.
    Because Managed Servicing System needs to create and destroy serving threads dynamically you're required to implement your own factory to let system produce instances of ServiceResponser<D, R> at runtime.
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceResponser<D,R> getServiceResponser()
      Create a new instance of ServiceResponser<D, R>

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceResponser

        ServiceResponser<D,R> getServiceResponser()
        Create a new instance of ServiceResponser<D, R>
        Returns:
        a new service responser object
